Challenge

Class DumbEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Entity
      • Challenge.Enemy
        • Challenge.DumbEnemy

  • public class DumbEnemy
extends Enemy
    A dumb enemy is an enemy whose movement is determined by the players location. It tries to find the shortest distance to the player and uses that path to determine its next direction. It does not take into account impassable territory hence it is a dumb enemy.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Samuel Roach, George Carpenter
